# Refine component

In this article, we will review the Refine component found in Refine source code. 

Locating this component
(Talk about how you find this component?)
- could not fine in index.tsx - https://github.com/refinedev/refine/blob/main/packages/core/src/index.tsx
- Search - https://github.com/search?q=repo%3Arefinedev%2Frefine+Refine+path%3A%2F%5Epackages%5C%2Fcore%5C%2Fsrc%5C%2F%2F&type=code
